name: Destabilizing Manipulative Frameworks
description: Breaking apart the foundational mechanisms that PSNs use to control others.
focus: Exposing Hidden Weaknesses in PSN Systems

cards.title: The Echo Chamber Collapse
cards.description: Breaking the internal consistency of their thought control frameworks.
bulletpoints: Introducing logically incompatible statements into their rhetoric forces cognitive stress.
Asking simple but difficult questions exposes weak points in their ideology.
Using their own phrases in reversed contexts makes their followers question their logic.

cards.title: Narrative Fracturing
cards.description: Exposing contradictions within their own messaging to weaken their influence.
bulletpoints: Highlighting inconsistencies in their rules and behaviors forces credibility erosion.
Encouraging others to ‘clarify’ their statements forces them into self-contradiction.
Leaking partial but undeniable truths discredits their authority over time.

cards.title: The Forced Reckoning
cards.description: Manipulating timing and external factors to force a PSN to reveal their true nature.
bulletpoints: Orchestrating subtle yet cumulative pressure forces them into reactionary mistakes.
Presenting undeniable proof in a way that forces them into defensive explanations.
Letting them escalate their tactics while remaining neutral ensures they self-destruct.
